name: Scandic Tampere Station

reviews.text: This is a very nice new hotel with stylish design. The room was clean and nice and the breakfast was great.
reviews.title: Great stylish hotel

reviews.text: At the time of our visit the hotel had just opened so part of the surroundings were not completed yet. The street address is apparently also so recent that our GPS navigator tried to direct us quite far away to the other end of the street. The hotel was, however, very easy to find by simply following the signs to the railway station.
reviews.title: Brand new and very modern!

description: Scandic Tampere Station is a modern and trendy city hotel in the heart of Tampere. You can work-out in our hotel gym, relax in the sauna.We offer a total of 200 rooms, 5 of which have their own sauna and balcony. On the ground floor, you'll find our relaxed and stylish bistro, the lobby bar, Scandic Shop, the lovely summer teracce and 5 meeting rooms. We also offer a private car park with 53 spaces, as well as wireless internet throughout the whole hotel.
